meanings.definition: The act of giving a name or nickname to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the dubbings her friends gave to their pets.
meanings.sent2: The dubbings for the characters in the story were creative.
meanings.sent3: The dubbings for the new students brought smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: Her dubbings for the plants in her garden made them feel special.
meanings.sent5: The dubbings in the game made it more fun and engaging.

meanings.definition: The process of adding a new soundtrack to a film or video.
meanings.sent1: The dubbings for the movie were done by professionals.
meanings.sent2: He learned about dubbings in his film class.
meanings.sent3: The dubbings for the comedy film made it even funnier.
meanings.sent4: The dubbings in the documentary enhanced the viewer's experience.
meanings.sent5: The dubbings in the action scene added intensity to the movie.

meanings.definition: The materials used to cover the body of a fly fishing lure.
meanings.sent1: He carefully selected the dubbings for his fishing trip.
meanings.sent2: The store had a wide variety of dubbings for fly tying.
meanings.sent3: The colorful dubbings attracted the fish in the river.
meanings.sent4: The dubbings on the lure mimicked real insects perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The shiny dubbings made the lure look more realistic.
